skills.skill: A+ Content & Enhanced Brand Content Development

duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform in-depth keyword research and optimize product listings for maximum visibility on Amazon.
Regularly audit and improve product listings to enhance search visibility, click-through rates, and conversions.
Monitor competitors' tactics on Amazon and adjust strategies to stay ahead in the marketplace.
Track, analyze, and report on key metrics related to Amazon search rankings and sales performance.
Collaborate with the content team to develop compelling A+ content and Enhanced Brand Content for product listings.
Devise strategies to encourage positive customer reviews and effectively manage negative feedback on Amazon.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
